description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，陕西凤翔人。曾任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任、中共辽宁省委书记等职，现任全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会副主任委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, from Fengxiang, Shaanxi. He has served as Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council, and Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee. He is currently a Vice Chairman of the National People's Congress Financial and Economic Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在辽宁省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Liaoning Province.

nodes.id: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设直属机构，代表国家履行出资人职责，监管中央所属企业的国有资产。
description.en: A special commission directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing state-owned assets of enterprises under the central government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国青海省的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Qinghai Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西藏自治区的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of the Tibet Autonomous Region, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省西安市的高等院校，以航空、航天、航海工程教育和科学研究为特色。
description.en: A university located in Xi'an, Shaanxi, China, specializing in education and research in aeronautical, astronautical, and marine engineering.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的前任中共辽宁省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的继任中共辽宁省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's successor as Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏担任中共辽宁省委书记期间的副书记兼省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as Deputy Secretary and Governor while Hao Peng was the Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏担任中共辽宁省委书记期间的副书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as Deputy Secretary while Hao Peng was the Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的前任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's predecessor as Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的继任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任、党委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's successor as Director and Party Committee Secretary of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的前任青海省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's predecessor as Governor of Qinghai Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郝鹏的继任青海省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, Hao Peng's successor as Governor of Qinghai Province.

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏的出生地，位于中国陕西省宝鸡市。
description.en: Hao Peng's birthplace, located in Baoji, Shaanxi Province, China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会
全国人大财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西藏自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in the Tibet Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党青海省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党青海省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在青海省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Qinghai Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2012年至2017年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2012 to 2017.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2017 to 2022.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党自2022年10月以来的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China since October 2022.

description.zh-cn: 位于甘肃兰州的国有企业，隶属于中国航空工业集团。
description.en: A state-owned enterprise in Lanzhou, Gansu, affiliated with the Aviation Industry Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的中国基本人民团体之一。
description.en: One of the basic people's organizations in China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 甘肃省经济贸易委员会

zh-cn: 甘肃省经济贸易委员会

description.zh-cn: 曾是负责甘肃省经济贸易工作的政府部门。
description.en: A former government department responsible for economic and trade affairs in Gansu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党兰州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党兰州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在兰州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Lanzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国兰州市的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Lanzhou City, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于2013年至2018年间的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China from 2013 to 2018.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国自2023年以来的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China since 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在辽宁省设立的军队一级组织。
description.en: A primary-level military organization of the People's Liberation Army established in Liaoning Province.

relationships.target: 凤翔县

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏于1960年7月出生于陕西省凤翔县。
description.en: Hao Peng was born in Fengxiang County, Shaanxi Province in July 1960.

relationships.target: 西北工业大学

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏于1978年至1982年在西北工业大学飞行器制造工程系学习，1997年至2000年在该校攻读航空系统工程专业并获得工学硕士学位。
description.en: Hao Peng studied at the Department of Aircraft Manufacturing Engineering at Northwestern Polytechnical University from 1978 to 1982, and later pursued a Master of Engineering degree in Aeronautical Systems Engineering at the same university from 1997 to 2000.

relationships.target: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任中国共产党辽宁省委员会书记。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏当选为辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Hao Peng was elected Director of the Standing Committee of the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会党委书记。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Party Committee Secretary of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council.

relationships.target: 青海省人民政府

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任青海省人民政府省长。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Governor of the People's Government of Qinghai Province.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任西藏自治区人民政府副主席。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Vice Chairman of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任西藏自治区人民政府常务副主席。
description.en: Hao Peng served as the Executive Vice Chairman of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任中共西藏自治区党委副书记、常务委员。
description.en: Hao Peng served as Deputy Secretary and Standing Committee Member of the CPC Tibet Autonomous Regional Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

position.en: Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏兼任中共西藏自治区党委政法委书记。
description.en: Hao Peng concurrently served as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Tibet Autonomous Regional Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党青海省委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任中共青海省委副书记。
description.en: Hao Peng served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Qinghai Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏是中国共产党第十八届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: Hao Peng was an alternate member of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏是中国共产党第十九届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Hao Peng was a member of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏是中国共产党第二十届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Hao Peng is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 兰州飞控仪器总厂

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏在中航工业兰州飞控仪器总厂工作17年，历任技术员、团委书记、厂长助理、分厂厂长，并于1994年升任厂长。
description.en: Hao Peng worked at AVIC Lanzhou Flight Control Instrument General Factory for 17 years, serving successively as technician, Youth League secretary, assistant factory director, branch factory director, and was promoted to Factory Director in 1994.

relationships.target: 中华全国青年联合会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏于1995年8月当选为中华全国青年联合会副主席。
description.en: Hao Peng was elected Vice Chairman of the All-China Youth Federation in August 1995.

relationships.target: 甘肃省经济贸易委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任甘肃省经贸委副主任（正厅级）。
description.en: Hao Peng served as Deputy Director (director-general level) of the Gansu Provincial Economic and Trade Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党兰州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏先后担任中共兰州市委常委、副书记。
description.en: Hao Peng successively served as a Standing Committee Member and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Lanzhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 兰州市人民政府

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏担任兰州市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Hao Peng served as Vice Mayor of the Lanzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏为第十二届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Hao Peng was a deputy to the 12th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏为第十四届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Hao Peng is a deputy to the 14th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 辽宁省军区

position.en: First Secretary of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏出任辽宁省军区党委第一书记。
description.en: Hao Peng serves as the First Secretary of the Party Committee of the Liaoning Provincial Military District.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏在卸任中共辽宁省委书记后，出任全国人大财政经济委员会副主任委员。
description.en: After stepping down as Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee, Hao Peng was appointed Vice Chairman of the National People's Congress Financial and Economic Affairs Committee.

relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 郝鹏作为中共中央委员及省级主要领导，是中共中央总书记习近平的下属。
description.en: As a member of the CPC Central Committee and a major provincial leader, Hao Peng is a subordinate of CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping.

relationships.target: 郝鹏

description.zh-cn: 在郝鹏担任中共辽宁省委书记期间，李乐成担任其副手及省政府首长。
description.en: While Hao Peng was Secretary of the CPC Liaoning Provincial Committee, Li Lecheng served as his deputy and the head of the provincial government.
